solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minDepth(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if(root == null) return 0;--newline--        int left = minDepth(root.left);--newline--        int right = minDepth(root.right);--newline--        return (left == 0 || right == 0) ? left + right + 1: Math.min(left,right) + 1;--newline--       --newline--    }--newline--}
